text: Chemotherapy.     -  Donor lymphocyte infusion.    -  Biologic therapy (interferon).    - A clinical trial of new types or higher doses of targeted therapy or donor stem cell transplant.         Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with relapsing chronic myelogenous leukemia.
